title: Uniswap V4 Set to Revolutionize DeFi Trading
description: Uniswapâ€™s upcoming V4 release introduces advanced features to improve decentralized trading.

body.raw: Uniswap is set to release its V4 update in Q3 2024, bringing advanced features that will streamline decentralized trading. This upgrade is highly anticipated and expected to drive significant market activity as it offers new tools for liquidity providers and traders.
